cItpXuaInstConfigLastChanged.name: cItpXuaInstConfigLastChanged
cItpXuaInstConfigLastChanged.description: The value of system timestamp at the time of the last creation or deletion of an entry in the cItpXuaInstTable. This value can be used to prevent unnecessary walks of the XUA Instance Table.

cItpXuaSgmConfigLastChanged.name: cItpXuaSgmConfigLastChanged
cItpXuaSgmConfigLastChanged.description: The value of system timestamp at the time of the last creation or deletion of an entry in the cItpXuaSgmTable. This value can be used to prevent unnecessary walks of the XUA SG Mate Table.

cItpXuaAspConfigLastChanged.name: cItpXuaAspConfigLastChanged
cItpXuaAspConfigLastChanged.description: The value of system timestamp at the time of the last creation or deletion of an entry in the cItpXuaAspTable. This value can be used to prevent unnecessary walks of the XUA ASP Table.

cItpXuaAsConfigLastChanged.name: cItpXuaAsConfigLastChanged
cItpXuaAsConfigLastChanged.description: The value of system timestamp at the time of the last creation or deletion of an entry in the cItpXuaAsTable. This value can be used to prevent unnecessary walks of the XUA AS Table.

cItpXuaStateChangeNotifEnabled.name: cItpXuaStateChangeNotifEnabled
cItpXuaStateChangeNotifEnabled.description: The State notification truth value. 'true' Indicates that the notification generation is enabled for ASP state changes, AS state changes and SG Mate state changes. 'false' Indicates that the notification generation is disabled for ASP state change, AS state and SG Mate state change.

cItpXuaInstTable.name: cItpXuaInstTable
cItpXuaInstTable.description: A table of M3UA/SUA/SGMP instances. There can be multiple M3UA or SUA instances on a given Signaling Gateway. Each instance is uniquely identified by the port number. The local port number of the ASP (cItpXuaAspLocalPort) matches with the port number of the instance (cItpXuaInstPort). Also for a given instance, there can be multiple local IP addresses which are used for the multi-homing feature of the SCTP associations. There can only be one instance of SGMP. Entries are added to this table via cItpXuaInstRowStatus in accordance with the RowStatus convention.

cItpXuaInstTableEntry.name: cItpXuaInstTableEntry
cItpXuaInstTableEntry.description: A list of XUA instance attributes.

cItpXuaInstPort.name: cItpXuaInstPort
cItpXuaInstPort.description: The local SCTP port for the XUA instance. The value zero is not allowed.

cItpXuaInstProtocol.name: cItpXuaInstProtocol
cItpXuaInstProtocol.description: The protocol of the XUA instance.

cItpXuaInstShut.name: cItpXuaInstShut
cItpXuaInstShut.description: The XUA Instance Shut truth value. 'true' Indicates that the XUA Instance has been shutdown by an administrative action. 'false' Indicates that the XUA Instance is not shutdown.

cItpXuaInstActiveASPs.name: cItpXuaInstActiveASPs
cItpXuaInstActiveASPs.description: The number of ASPs connected to this instance.

cItpXuaInstRowStatus.name: cItpXuaInstRowStatus
cItpXuaInstRowStatus.description: The object is used by a management station to create or delete the row entry in cItpXuaInstTable following the RowStatus textual convention.

cItpXuaInstLocalIpTable.name: cItpXuaInstLocalIpTable
cItpXuaInstLocalIpTable.description: A table of Local IP addresses for the XUA instances. For a given instance, there can be multiple local IP addresses which are used for the multi-homing feature of the SCTP associations. This table lists out the configured local IP addresses. Entries are added to this table via cItpXuaInstLocalIpRowStatus in accordance with the RowStatus convention.

cItpXuaInstLocalIpTableEntry.name: cItpXuaInstLocalIpTableEntry
cItpXuaInstLocalIpTableEntry.description: A list of attributes of the Local IP addresses for the XUA instances.

cItpXuaInstAddrNum.name: cItpXuaInstAddrNum
cItpXuaInstAddrNum.description: This object specifies the index for the XUA instance's IP address. The SCTP port number cItpXuaInstPort specifies the XUA instance.

cItpXuaInstLocalIpType.name: cItpXuaInstLocalIpType
cItpXuaInstLocalIpType.description: This object contains the type of the local IP address used to create the association for ASPs connecting to the XUA instance specified by the cItpXuaInstPort.

cItpXuaInstLocalIpAddr.name: cItpXuaInstLocalIpAddr
cItpXuaInstLocalIpAddr.description: This object contains the local IP address used to create the association for ASPs connecting to the XUA instance specified by the cItpXuaInstPort.

cItpXuaInstLocalIpRowStatus.name: cItpXuaInstLocalIpRowStatus
cItpXuaInstLocalIpRowStatus.description: The object is used by a management station to create or delete the row entry in cItpXuaInstLocalIpTable following the RowStatus textual convention.

cItpXuaSgmTable.name: cItpXuaSgmTable
cItpXuaSgmTable.description: A table of SG Mate attributes. Entries are added to this table via cItpXuaSgmRowStatus in accordance with the RowStatus convention.

cItpXuaSgmTableEntry.name: cItpXuaSgmTableEntry
cItpXuaSgmTableEntry.description: A list of SG Mate attributes.

cItpXuaSgmName.name: cItpXuaSgmName
cItpXuaSgmName.description: The name of the SG Mate.

cItpXuaSgmAssocId.name: cItpXuaSgmAssocId
cItpXuaSgmAssocId.description: This is the association identifier defined in the Stream Control Transmission Protocol(SCTP) MIB. A value greater than zero indicates a valid association and zero indicates no association.

cItpXuaSgmLocalPort.name: cItpXuaSgmLocalPort
cItpXuaSgmLocalPort.description: This object contains the local SCTP port number used to create the association supporting this link. This local port determines the XUA instance that this SG Mate is connected with. The value zero is not allowed.

cItpXuaSgmRemotePort.name: cItpXuaSgmRemotePort
cItpXuaSgmRemotePort.description: This object contains the remote SCTP port number used to create the association supporting this link. The value zero is not allowed.

cItpXuaSgmShut.name: cItpXuaSgmShut
cItpXuaSgmShut.description: The SG Mate shut truth value. 'true' Indicates that the SG Mate has been shutdown by an administrative action. 'false' Indicates that the SG Mate is not shutdown.

cItpXuaSgmActiveTS.name: cItpXuaSgmActiveTS
cItpXuaSgmActiveTS.description: The value of system timestamp at the time when this SG Mate became active. A value of zero (0) indicates that the SG Mate is not active.

cItpXuaSgmQosClass.name: cItpXuaSgmQosClass
cItpXuaSgmQosClass.description: This object specifies the QOS class for the SG Mate. The value of 255 is not applicable. A value of zero (0) indicates that QOS class is not defined.

cItpXuaSgmPassive.name: cItpXuaSgmPassive
cItpXuaSgmPassive.description: The SG Mate Passive truth value. 'true' Indicates that the SG Mate is passive, i.e. it waits for the SG Mate to initiate the SCTP association. 'false' Indicates that the SG Mate is not passive, i.e., it initiates the SCTP association with its SG Mate.

cItpXuaSgmState.name: cItpXuaSgmState
cItpXuaSgmState.description: The state of the SG Mate. Only active and inactive states are applicable.

cItpXuaSgmRowStatus.name: cItpXuaSgmRowStatus
cItpXuaSgmRowStatus.description: The object is used by a management station to create or delete the row entry in cItpXuaSgmTable following the RowStatus textual convention.

cItpXuaAspTable.name: cItpXuaAspTable
cItpXuaAspTable.description: A table of Application Server Processes (ASP). Entries are added to this table via cItpXuaAspRowStatus in accordance with the RowStatus convention.

cItpXuaAspTableEntry.name: cItpXuaAspTableEntry
cItpXuaAspTableEntry.description: A list of Application Server Processes.

cItpXuaAspName.name: cItpXuaAspName
cItpXuaAspName.description: The name of the Applicaton Server Process.

cItpXuaAspAssocId.name: cItpXuaAspAssocId
cItpXuaAspAssocId.description: This is the association identifier defined in the Stream Control Transmission Protocol(SCTP) MIB. A value greater than zero indicates a valid association and zero indicates no association.

cItpXuaAspLocalPort.name: cItpXuaAspLocalPort
cItpXuaAspLocalPort.description: This object contains the local SCTP port number used to create the association supporting this link. This local port determines the XUA instance that this ASP is connected with. The value zero is not allowed.

cItpXuaAspRemotePort.name: cItpXuaAspRemotePort
cItpXuaAspRemotePort.description: This object contains the configured remote SCTP port number used to create the association supporting this link. The value zero means any non-zero remote port is acceptable. The actual remote port can be determined from SCTP association in cItpXuaAspAssocId.

cItpXuaAspProtocol.name: cItpXuaAspProtocol
cItpXuaAspProtocol.description: The protocol used by this ASP. Only M3UA or SUA are allowed.

cItpXuaAspShut.name: cItpXuaAspShut
cItpXuaAspShut.description: The ASP Shut truth value. 'true' Indicates that the ASP has been shutdown by an administrative action. 'false' Indicates that the ASP is not shutdown.

cItpXuaAspBlocked.name: cItpXuaAspBlocked
cItpXuaAspBlocked.description: When an ASP is blocked, it cannot receive normal data traffic, but it can send or receive control messages. The ASP Blocked truth value. 'true' Indicates that the ASP has been blocked by an administrative action. 'false' Indicates that the ASP is not blocked.

cItpXuaAspQosClass.name: cItpXuaAspQosClass
cItpXuaAspQosClass.description: This object specifies the QOS class for the ASP. The value of 255 is not applicable. A value of zero (0) indicates that QOS class is not defined. When QOS class is defined, it overrides the QOS class specified by cItpXuaAsQosClass.

cItpXuaAspIdentifier.name: cItpXuaAspIdentifier
cItpXuaAspIdentifier.description: A unique value received by the Signaling Gateway from the ASP as part of ASP UP message.

cItpXuaAspRowStatus.name: cItpXuaAspRowStatus
cItpXuaAspRowStatus.description: The object is used by a management station to create or delete the row entry in cItpXuaAspTable following the RowStatus textual convention.

cItpXuaAspRemoteIpTable.name: cItpXuaAspRemoteIpTable
cItpXuaAspRemoteIpTable.description: A table of Remote IP addresses for the Application Server Processes (ASP). For a given ASP, there can be multiple remote IP addresses which are used for the multi-homing feature of the SCTP associations. Entries are added to this table via cItpXuaAspRemoteIpRowStatus in accordance with the RowStatus convention.

cItpXuaAspRemoteIpTableEntry.name: cItpXuaAspRemoteIpTableEntry
cItpXuaAspRemoteIpTableEntry.description: A list of Remote IP addresses for the Application Server Processes.

cItpXuaAspAddrNum.name: cItpXuaAspAddrNum
cItpXuaAspAddrNum.description: This object specifies the index for the ASP's remote IP address. The ASP Name in cItpXuaAspName specifies the ASP.

cItpXuaAspRemoteIpType.name: cItpXuaAspRemoteIpType
cItpXuaAspRemoteIpType.description: This object contains the type of the remote IP address used to create the association supporting this ASP.

cItpXuaAspRemoteIpAddr.name: cItpXuaAspRemoteIpAddr
cItpXuaAspRemoteIpAddr.description: This object contains the remote IP address used to create the association supporting this ASP.

cItpXuaAspRemoteIpRowStatus.name: cItpXuaAspRemoteIpRowStatus
cItpXuaAspRemoteIpRowStatus.description: The object is used by a management station to create or delete the row entry in cItpXuaAspRemoteIpTable following the RowStatus textual convention.

cItpXuaAspStatsTable.name: cItpXuaAspStatsTable
cItpXuaAspStatsTable.description: A table of Application Server Processes (ASP) statistics.

cItpXuaAspPktsFromAsp.name: cItpXuaAspPktsFromAsp
cItpXuaAspPktsFromAsp.description: The number of data packets received from this ASP.

cItpXuaAspPktsToAsp.name: cItpXuaAspPktsToAsp
cItpXuaAspPktsToAsp.description: The number of data packets sent to this ASP.

cItpXuaAspPktsFromMtp3.name: cItpXuaAspPktsFromMtp3
cItpXuaAspPktsFromMtp3.description: The number of data packets received from MTP3.

cItpXuaAspPktsToMtp3.name: cItpXuaAspPktsToMtp3
cItpXuaAspPktsToMtp3.description: The number of data packets sent to MTP3.

cItpXuaAspASPUPsRcvd.name: cItpXuaAspASPUPsRcvd
cItpXuaAspASPUPsRcvd.reference: Section 3.5.1 ASP Up (UP) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspASPUPsRcvd.description: The number of ASP Up messages received.

cItpXuaAspASPUPACKsSent.name: cItpXuaAspASPUPACKsSent
cItpXuaAspASPUPACKsSent.reference: Section 3.5.2 ASP Up Acknowledgement (ASP Up Ack) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspASPUPACKsSent.description: The number of ASP Up ACK messages sent.

cItpXuaAspASPDNsRcvd.name: cItpXuaAspASPDNsRcvd
cItpXuaAspASPDNsRcvd.reference: Section 3.5.3 ASP Down of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspASPDNsRcvd.description: The number of ASP Down messages received.

cItpXuaAspASPDNACKsSent.name: cItpXuaAspASPDNACKsSent
cItpXuaAspASPDNACKsSent.reference: Section 3.5.4 ASP Down Acknowledgement (ASP Down Ack) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspASPDNACKsSent.description: The number of ASP Down ACK messages sent.

cItpXuaAspASPACsRcvd.name: cItpXuaAspASPACsRcvd
cItpXuaAspASPACsRcvd.reference: Sections 3.7.1 ASP Active of M3UA draft and 3.6.1 of SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspASPACsRcvd.description: The number of ASP Active messages received.

cItpXuaAspASPACACKsSent.name: cItpXuaAspASPACACKsSent
cItpXuaAspASPACACKsSent.reference: Sections 3.7.2 ASP Active Acknowledgement (ASP Active Ack) of M3UA draft and 3.6.2 ASP Active (ACTIVE) of SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspASPACACKsSent.description: The number of ASP Active ACK messages sent.

cItpXuaAspASPIAsRcvd.name: cItpXuaAspASPIAsRcvd
cItpXuaAspASPIAsRcvd.reference: Sections 3.7.3 ASP Inactive of M3UA draft and 3.6.3 of SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspASPIAsRcvd.description: The number of ASP Inactive messages received.

cItpXuaAspASPIAACKsSent.name: cItpXuaAspASPIAACKsSent
cItpXuaAspASPIAACKsSent.reference: Sections 3.7.4 ASP Inactive Acknowledgement (ASP Inactive Ack) of M3UA draft and 3.6.4 ASP Inactive (INACTIVE) of SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspASPIAACKsSent.description: The number of ASP Inactive ACK messages sent.

cItpXuaAspErrorsRcvd.name: cItpXuaAspErrorsRcvd
cItpXuaAspErrorsRcvd.reference: Sections 3.8.1 Error of M3UA draft and 3.7.1 Error (ERR) of SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspErrorsRcvd.description: The number of ASP Error messages received.

cItpXuaAspErrorsSent.name: cItpXuaAspErrorsSent
cItpXuaAspErrorsSent.reference: Sections 3.8.1 Error of M3UA draft and 3.7.1 Error (ERR) of SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspErrorsSent.description: The number of ASP Error messages sent.

cItpXuaAspNotifysSent.name: cItpXuaAspNotifysSent
cItpXuaAspNotifysSent.reference: Sections 3.8.2 Notify of M3UA draft and 3.7.2 Notify (NTFY) of SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspNotifysSent.description: The number of ASP Notify messages sent.

cItpXuaAspDUNAsRcvd.name: cItpXuaAspDUNAsRcvd
cItpXuaAspDUNAsRcvd.reference: Section 3.4.1 Destination Unavailable (DUNA) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspDUNAsRcvd.description: The number of Destination Unavailable messages received.

cItpXuaAspDUNAsSent.name: cItpXuaAspDUNAsSent
cItpXuaAspDUNAsSent.reference: Section 3.4.1 Destination Unavailable (DUNA) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspDUNAsSent.description: The number of Destination Unavailable messages sent.

cItpXuaAspDAVAsRcvd.name: cItpXuaAspDAVAsRcvd
cItpXuaAspDAVAsRcvd.reference: Section 3.4.2 Destination Available (DAVA) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspDAVAsRcvd.description: The number of Destination Available messages received.

cItpXuaAspDAVAsSent.name: cItpXuaAspDAVAsSent
cItpXuaAspDAVAsSent.reference: Section 3.4.2 Destination Available (DAVA) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspDAVAsSent.description: The number of Destination Available messages sent.

cItpXuaAspDUPUsRcvd.name: cItpXuaAspDUPUsRcvd
cItpXuaAspDUPUsRcvd.reference: Section 3.4.5 Destination User Part Unavailable (DUPU) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspDUPUsRcvd.description: The number of Destination User Part Unavailable messages received.

cItpXuaAspDUPUsSent.name: cItpXuaAspDUPUsSent
cItpXuaAspDUPUsSent.reference: Section 3.4.5 Destination User Part Unavailable (DUPU) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspDUPUsSent.description: The number of Destination User Part Unavailable messages sent.

cItpXuaAspDAUDsRcvd.name: cItpXuaAspDAUDsRcvd
cItpXuaAspDAUDsRcvd.reference: Section 3.4.3 Destination State Audit (DAUD) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspDAUDsRcvd.description: The number of Destination State Audit messages received.

cItpXuaAspDAUDsSent.name: cItpXuaAspDAUDsSent
cItpXuaAspDAUDsSent.reference: Section 3.4.3 Destination State Audit (DAUD) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspDAUDsSent.description: The number of Destination State Audit messages sent.

cItpXuaAspSCON0sRcvd.name: cItpXuaAspSCON0sRcvd
cItpXuaAspSCON0sRcvd.reference: Section 3.4.4 Signalling Congestion (SCON) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspSCON0sRcvd.description: The number of Signaling Congestion messages with congestion level 0 (or no congestion) received.

cItpXuaAspSCON1sRcvd.name: cItpXuaAspSCON1sRcvd
cItpXuaAspSCON1sRcvd.reference: Section 3.4.4 Signalling Congestion (SCON) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspSCON1sRcvd.description: The number of Signaling Congestion messages with congestion level 1 received.

cItpXuaAspSCON2sRcvd.name: cItpXuaAspSCON2sRcvd
cItpXuaAspSCON2sRcvd.reference: Section 3.4.4 Signalling Congestion (SCON) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspSCON2sRcvd.description: The number of Signaling Congestion messages with congestion level 2 received.

cItpXuaAspSCON3sRcvd.name: cItpXuaAspSCON3sRcvd
cItpXuaAspSCON3sRcvd.reference: Section 3.4.4 Signalling Congestion (SCON) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspSCON3sRcvd.description: The number of Signaling Congestion messages with congestion level 3 received.

cItpXuaAspSCON0sSent.name: cItpXuaAspSCON0sSent
cItpXuaAspSCON0sSent.reference: Section 3.4.4 Signalling Congestion (SCON) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspSCON0sSent.description: The number of Signaling Congestion messages with congestion level 0 (or no congestion) sent.

cItpXuaAspSCON1sSent.name: cItpXuaAspSCON1sSent
cItpXuaAspSCON1sSent.reference: Section 3.4.4 Signalling Congestion (SCON) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspSCON1sSent.description: The number of Signaling Congestion messages with congestion level 1 sent.

cItpXuaAspSCON2sSent.name: cItpXuaAspSCON2sSent
cItpXuaAspSCON2sSent.reference: Section 3.4.4 Signalling Congestion (SCON) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspSCON2sSent.description: The number of Signaling Congestion messages with congestion level 2 sent.

cItpXuaAspSCON3sSent.name: cItpXuaAspSCON3sSent
cItpXuaAspSCON3sSent.reference: Section 3.4.4 Signalling Congestion (SCON) of M3UA/SUA draft.
cItpXuaAspSCON3sSent.description: The number of Signaling Congestion messages with congestion level 3 sent.

cItpXuaAsTable.name: cItpXuaAsTable
cItpXuaAsTable.description: A table of M3UA/SUA Application Server (AS) entries. Entries are added to this table via cItpXuaAsRowStatus in accordance with the RowStatus convention.

cItpXuaAsTableEntry.name: cItpXuaAsTableEntry
cItpXuaAsTableEntry.description: A list of M3UA/SUA AS attributes.

cItpXuaAsName.name: cItpXuaAsName
cItpXuaAsName.description: The Application Server name. This name has only local significance.

cItpXuaAsProtocol.name: cItpXuaAsProtocol
cItpXuaAsProtocol.description: The protocol used by this AS.

cItpXuaAsShut.name: cItpXuaAsShut
cItpXuaAsShut.description: The AS Shut truth value. 'true' Indicates that the AS has been shutdown by an administrative action. 'false' Indicates that the AS is not shutdown.

cItpXuaAsStateOnSgMate.name: cItpXuaAsStateOnSgMate
cItpXuaAsStateOnSgMate.description: The Application Server (AS) state on the mated Signaling Gateway. This object provides the status of an Application Service as provided by the Signaling Gateway Mated Protocol. This object can be used by the NMS to assist in problem determination. Each Signaling Gateway Mated pair should have same definitions. This allows the NMS examine the status Application Service from perspective of each Signalling Gateway. If the definitions are different on the mated pairs the NMS will be unable to determine the relationships between the ASes and mated pairs.

cItpXuaAsActiveTS.name: cItpXuaAsActiveTS
cItpXuaAsActiveTS.description: The value of system uptime at the time when this AS became active. A value of zero (0) indicates that the AS is not active.

cItpXuaAsQosClass.name: cItpXuaAsQosClass
cItpXuaAsQosClass.description: The AS specifies the QOS class for all its ASPs. The value of 255 is not applicable. A value of zero (0) indicates that QOS class is not defined. This value can be overridden by cItpXuaAspQosClass.

cItpXuaAsTrafMode.name: cItpXuaAsTrafMode
cItpXuaAsTrafMode.description: The traffic mode for the data packets received for this AS.

cItpXuaAsRerouting.name: cItpXuaAsRerouting
cItpXuaAsRerouting.description: The AS Rerouting truth value. 'true' Indicates that this SG is rerouting the traffic to the mated SG. 'false' Indicates that this SG is not rerouting the traffic to the mated SG.

cItpXuaAsRoutingContext.name: cItpXuaAsRoutingContext
cItpXuaAsRoutingContext.reference: 1.4.2 Routing Contexts and Routing Keys in M3UA draft and 3.9.6 Routing Context in SUA draft.
cItpXuaAsRoutingContext.description: An ASP may be configured to serve more than one AS. In this case, the Routing Context parameter is exchanged between the SG and the ASP, identifying the relevant AS. The Routing Context uniquely identifies the range of traffic associated with a particular AS, which the ASP is configured to receive. There is a 1:1 relationship between a Routing Context value and a Routing Key within an AS.

cItpXuaAsRkParameters.name: cItpXuaAsRkParameters
cItpXuaAsRkParameters.description: The cItpXuaAsRkParameters object indicates which Routing Key parameters are valid for this AS. 'dpc' : The cItpXuaAsRkDpc is the relevant column. 'opc' : cItpXuaAsRkOpc and cItpXuaAsRkOpcMask are the relevant columns. 'opcMask' : Indicates that a mask is to be applied when the opc is specified in the routing key. If the mask is not specified then the mask is assumed to be all zeros. 'si' : The cItpXuaAsRkSi is the relevant column. 'ssn' : Indicates that a SSN is to be checked as part of the routing key. 'gtt' : The cItpXuaAsRkGtt is the relevant column. It indicates that routing key for this AS can be the result of Global Title Translation. 'cic' : The cItpXuaAsRkCicMin and cItpXuaAsRkCicMax are the relevant columns. The following combination is allowed for all si's: gtt dpc dpc + opc dpc + opc + opcMask When si equals 3 (SCCP), the following is allowed: dpc + si dpc + si + opc dpc + si + ssn dpc + si + ssn + opc When si equals 5 (ISUP), the following is allowed: dpc + si dpc + si + opc dpc + si + cic dpc + si + cic + opc

cItpXuaAsRkDpc.name: cItpXuaAsRkDpc
cItpXuaAsRkDpc.description: The Destination Point Code (DPC) in the routing key for the AS. The 'dpc' bit in the cItpXuaAsRkParameters object is used to indicate whether this object's value has any current relevance.

cItpXuaAsRkOpc.name: cItpXuaAsRkOpc
cItpXuaAsRkOpc.description: The Origin Point Code (OPC) in the routing key for the AS. The 'opc' bit in the cItpXuaAsRkParameters object is used to indicate whether this object's value has any current relevance.

cItpXuaAsRkOpcMask.name: cItpXuaAsRkOpcMask
cItpXuaAsRkOpcMask.description: The Origin Point Code (OPC) mask in the routing key for the AS. The 'opcMask' bit in the cItpXuaAsRkParameters object is used to indicate whether this object's value has any current relevance.

cItpXuaAsRkSi.name: cItpXuaAsRkSi
cItpXuaAsRkSi.description: The Service Indicator in the routing key for the AS. The 'si' bit in the cItpXuaAsRkParameters object is used to indicate whether this object's value has any current relevance.

cItpXuaAsRkSsn.name: cItpXuaAsRkSsn
cItpXuaAsRkSsn.description: The SubSystem Number (SSN) in routing key for the AS. The 'ssn' bit in the cItpXuaAsRkParameters object is used to indicate whether this object's value has any current relevance.

cItpXuaAsRkGtt.name: cItpXuaAsRkGtt
cItpXuaAsRkGtt.description: The Routing key Global Title Translation (GTT) truth value. 'true' Indicates that the GTT is enabled. 'false' Indicates that the GTT is not enabled. The 'gtt' bit in the cItpXuaAsRkParameters object is used to indicate whether this object's value has any current relevance.

cItpXuaAsRkCicMin.name: cItpXuaAsRkCicMin
cItpXuaAsRkCicMin.description: The Routing key minimum CIC value. The 'cic' bit in the cItpXuaAsRkParameters object is used to indicate whether this object's value has any current relevance.

cItpXuaAsRkCicMax.name: cItpXuaAsRkCicMax
cItpXuaAsRkCicMax.description: The Routing key maximum CIC value. The 'cic' bit in the cItpXuaAsRkParameters object is used to indicate whether this object's value has any current relevance.

cItpXuaAsPktsFromMtp3.name: cItpXuaAsPktsFromMtp3
cItpXuaAsPktsFromMtp3.description: The number of data packets received from MTP3.

cItpXuaAsPktsToASPsOfAs.name: cItpXuaAsPktsToASPsOfAs
cItpXuaAsPktsToASPsOfAs.description: The number of data packets sent to all ASPs that are serving this AS.

cItpXuaAsRowStatus.name: cItpXuaAsRowStatus
cItpXuaAsRowStatus.description: The object is used by a management station to create or delete the row entry in cItpXuaAsTable following the RowStatus textual convention.

cItpXuaAspAsTable.name: cItpXuaAspAsTable
cItpXuaAspAsTable.description: A table of M3UA/SUA ASP-AS entries. An ASP can serve one or more ASes. For each AS that it serves, the ASP maintains the state information. Entries are added to this table via cItpXuaAspAsRowStatus in accordance with the RowStatus convention.

cItpXuaAspAsTableEntry.name: cItpXuaAspAsTableEntry
cItpXuaAspAsTableEntry.description: A list of M3UA/SUA ASP-AS attributes.

cItpXuaAspAsState.name: cItpXuaAspAsState
cItpXuaAspAsState.description: The state of the ASP that serves this AS.

cItpXuaAspAsActiveTS.name: cItpXuaAspAsActiveTS
cItpXuaAspAsActiveTS.description: The value of system timestamp at the time when this ASP became active with respect to the specified AS. If the ASP is not active with respect to the specified AS this object will contain a value of zero.

cItpXuaAspAsRowStatus.name: cItpXuaAspAsRowStatus
cItpXuaAspAsRowStatus.description: The object is used by a management station to create or delete the row entry in cItpXuaAspAsTable following the RowStatus textual convention.

cItpXuaSgmDisplayName.name: cItpXuaSgmDisplayName
cItpXuaSgmDisplayName.description: This object identifies the SG Mate name associated with the ciscoItpXuaSgmStateChange notification.

cItpXuaAspDisplayName.name: cItpXuaAspDisplayName
cItpXuaAspDisplayName.description: This object identifies the ASP name associated with the ciscoItpXuaAspStateChange notification.

cItpXuaAsDisplayName.name: cItpXuaAsDisplayName
cItpXuaAsDisplayName.description: This object identifies the AS name associated with the ciscoItpXuaAspStateChange and ciscoItpXuaAsStateChange notifications.

ciscoItpXuaAspStateChange.name: ciscoItpXuaAspStateChange
ciscoItpXuaAspStateChange.description: The notification generated when an ASP changes to a new state. The value of cItpXuaAspAsState indicates the new state for the ASP that is serving the AS specified by cItpXuaAsDisplayName.

ciscoItpXuaSgmStateChange.name: ciscoItpXuaSgmStateChange
ciscoItpXuaSgmStateChange.description: The notification generated when an SG Mate changes to a new state. The value of cItpXuaSgmState indicates the new state for the SG Mate.

ciscoItpXuaAsStateChange.name: ciscoItpXuaAsStateChange
ciscoItpXuaAsStateChange.description: The notification generated when an AS changes to a new state. The value of cItpXuaAsState indicates the new state for the AS.
